About.paragraph: WebDocTool is a free plateform where you can use various tools. WebDocTool has weather, geolocation, image processing tools like convertor, editor. We provide the all the tools free. You don't have to get registered anywhere, just use it.
Why: Not required additional knowledge to use the tools
Why2: All features are enabled and ready for use.
Can save information for future use.

Services.name: Image Convertor
Services.text: Convert image from jpg/jpeg/png to other image type. You can resize and optimize images.

Services.name: File Editor
Services.text: You can edit files, text in supported editor.

Services.name: Find Geohraphic information between places
Services.text: Find distance, travelling time, all geographic information between places.

Services.name: Software Testing
Services.text: Test softwares, api load testing with ananlytics data.
